dct_description_sm: lithographed in the Reproduction Branch, OSS.
Shows distribution of the tribal society and transborder ethnic groups in Iran, international boundaries, railroads, and main roads.
dct_creator_sm: United States, Office of Strategic Services., Research and Analysis Branch.
